data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Kiambu, Kenya humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kiambu, Kenya
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Kiambu, Kenya who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.section_summary: On average, 30 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Kiambu, Kenya.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Kiambu.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Kiambu, Kenya will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Spirit, encourage the church of Kiambu, Kenya that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 490,605 cultural Christians in the state of Kiambu to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Kiambu to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...
